thread.title: Istanbul hospital siege: Armed man holding staff hostage, Turkish media reports
thread.title_full: Istanbul hospital siege: Armed man holding staff hostage, Turkish media reports

author: Our Foreign Staff
title: Istanbul hospital siege: Armed man holding staff hostage, Turkish media reports
text:
Istanbul hospital siege: Armed man holding staff hostage, Turkish media reports Turkish media is reporting that an armed man is holding staff hostage at a hospital in Istanbul. Our Foreign Staff 1 February 2017 â€¢ 11:33am 
T urkish media reports say an armed man is holding a number of doctors and other staff hostage at a hospital in Istanbul. 
The Hurriyet newspaper says Wednesday the gunman is believed to be a patient at the psychiatric unit of Istanbul's Cerrahpasa hospital. It says police have been dispatched to the scene. 
More to follow...
